mapper.select: select lineGuid, lineNumber, lineInfo, link, trend, status from line where status = 'enable' and lineNumber = #{lineNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO line (lineGuid, lineNumber, lineInfo, link, trend, status) VALUES (#{lineGuid}, #{lineNumber}, #{lineInfo}, #{link}, #{trend}, 'enable')
mapper.select: select lineGuid, standCode, standName, link, status from singleline where status = 'enable' and lineGuid = #{lineGuid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO singleline (lineGuid, standCode, standName, link, status) VALUES ( #{lineGuid}, #{standCode}, #{standName}, #{link}, 'enable' )
INSERT INTO station_bus (lineGuid, standCode, link, status) VALUES ( #{lineGuid}, #{standCode}, #{link}, 'enable' );
mapper.select: select * from station_bus where lineGuid = #{lineCode} and standCode = #{standCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO station (standCode, standName, road, roadSection, area, trend ) VALUES (#{standCode}, #{standName}, #{road}, #{roadSection}, #{area}, #{trend} )
